item.title: Coast to Coast v2.20.54.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

Coast to Coast v2.20.54.1 ATS

Changelog v2.20.54.1
Fixed some scenery issues, invisible walls etc.
Updated for Missouri DLC.

Description:
The original map expansion for American Truck Simulator.
Requires all Map DLCs

Note:
Make sure to place the map in correct load order or it will cause issues!
Game version: 1.54

Credits: Mantrid

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: FORD CARGO LOIRA 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

FORD CARGO LOIRA 1.54 ETS2

The Ford Cargo “Tal da Loira” mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a customized version of the Ford Cargo truck, tailored for urban and regional deliveries. This mod features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, and smooth driving physics. It offers various customization options, including different chassis configurations, paint jobs, accessories, and lighting setups. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod provides an authentic and immersive driving experience for players seeking a reliable and agile truck for city logistics.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania 113H TopLine FREE 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

Scania 113H TopLine FREE 1.54 ETS2

The Scania 113H Topline mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.54 introduces the iconic Scania 113H truck, renowned for its durability and classic design. This mod features a Topline cabin, 4×2 and 6×2 chassis options, and a selection of engines ranging from 360 hp to 700 hp. It includes a detailed interior, multiple transmission choices (8, 10, and 12-speed), and various customization options such as tuning parts and paint jobs. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.54, this mod offers an authentic and immersive driving experience for enthusiasts of classic Scania trucks.

Credits: KARLOS KIFFURI

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Ford Trucks F-MAX brasil 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 9, 2025

Ford Trucks F-MAX brasil 1.54 ETS2

The Ford Trucks F-MAX mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.54 introduces the award-winning Ford F-MAX truck, renowned for its performance and comfort. This mod features a meticulously detailed exterior and interior, capturing the authentic design of the real-world F-MAX. It includes the original dashboard, realistic engine sounds sourced from Engine Voice Records, and animated elements such as pedals and handbrake. The mod offers two chassis options: 4×2 Normal and 4×2 Low-Level (LL), powered by a 500 PS engine delivering 2500 Nm of torque, paired with a ZF 12TX2620 gearbox. Customization options encompass changeable front grills (black or white), adjustable spoilers, various sunshield designs, animated mudflaps, and support for cabin accessories. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.54, this mod delivers an immersive and authentic driving experience for enthusiasts of modern trucks. ​

Credits: kodo fast

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
